import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaInfoCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; // Importing an icon for course stats const CoursePage = () => { const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const courseStats = [ { title: "Attendance", description: "Details about attendance policies and requirements." }, { title: "Exams", description: "Information on exam weight, difficulty, and structure." }, { title: "Homework", description: "Overview of homework frequency, difficulty, and expectations." }, { title: "Grading Policy", description: "Breakdown of grade components and grading criteria." }, ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

CSCI1010

Intro to Computer Science

{/* Dropdown for Past Syllabi */}
{isDropdownOpen && (
  • Fall 2024
  • Spring 2024
)}
{/* Main Content Wrapper */}
{/* Course Stats Section */}

Course Stats

Info provided by the RPI community

{courseStats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.title}

{stat.description}

))}
{/* Student Reviews Section */}

Student Reviews

{[1, 2, 3].map((review, index) => (

Review Title {index + 1}

Semester/Year

Reviewer Name

Date

))}
{/* Submit Course Stats Form */}

Submit Course Statistics

Share your experience and course details

); }; export default CoursePage;
